thread.section_title: Hotel Belleclaire - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location on Upper West Side
thread.title_full: Great Location on Upper West Side - Review of Hotel Belleclaire, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: CookieMommie
title: Great Location on Upper West Side
text: This is our "Go To" hotel in New York. It's an old hotel, but the rooms are clean have been nicely updated. There are a variety of rooms available from those suited for an individual traveler to suites. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The location can't be beat. It's 2-3 blocks from the hotel to the nearest subway station, making it very easy to get anywhere in the city. It is also located within walking distance to a lot of shops and restaurants and we feel safe walking around the neighborhood at any hour. Valet parking is available for $51 for 24 hours, no in and out. However, you don't need or want your car because of all the convenient transportation options available.
